1575490.name: Conductor: Content Pack 1
1575490.description:
Hi hi Conductor friends!

If you'd like to support our efforts, please consider purchasing this DLC! As a thank you for supporting us, we'll be including an 8 pack of super cool element images we've made to be imported into Conductor for some pretty sick experiences!

If you right click on Conductor in your game's list and go to Manage -> Browse Local Files, you'll be taken to the install directory for Conductor, and the DLC images will be in a folder called Conductor Donation Pack 1.

Be sure to check out the manual (found through the store page links section) to learn how to properly import your content into Conductor!
